description: Try our easy to follow Hot Cross Bun Topped With Cream Cheese And Fruit recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot Cross Bun Topped With Cream Cheese And Fruit
name: Hot Cross Bun Topped With Cream Cheese And Fruit Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread cream cheese over hot bun halves, top with sliced fruit, then drizzle over a little honey. Serve.
Spread cream cheese over hot bun halves, top with sliced fruit, then drizzle over a little honey. Serve.
